title: Fps drop
body:
I've been having a problem this past weak with fps. Id start a game with 120-180 frames and then whenever I would see an enemy champion or minion the games fps goes down to 30 and freezes occasionally. During mid game the game is unplayable, I have less then 15 frames and game freezes every 5 seconds.
Did anyone else have this same problem and come up with a fix? If so I would like to know what to do.

replies.body: I've noticed some players started having fps issues again after certain windows updates, and I'd like to have you check to make sure the Game DVR bar wasn't re-enabled automatically again. Make sure it's still turned off, as well as any other intensive programs like Discord (disable it's overlay) or Razr Synapse. Let me know if turning those off help or not!
Hello, unfortunately no. Have a Logitech mouse and only TS and Skype on it. The other is all off.

Hmmmmm ok. I'm still a little curious if something in the background is impacting League somehow. Try running a quick [**clean boot**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684#wq3) for me and trying League to see if it still happens.
Sry that I am writing here in your thread. The problem is not only here, but also on the EUW server. I tried your tip the night before, but that did not help either.
